item.title: About Poff Dev
item.description: Poff Development is a full-service web development company based in Tucson AZ.

item.title: Welcome to Poff Dev!
item.description: Introduction Poff Development is a full-service web development company based in Tucson AZ. Don’t Repeat Yourself DRY is a good design goal and Hugo does a great job supporting it. Part of the art of a good template is knowing when to add a new template and when to update an existing one. While you’re figuring that out, accept that you’ll be doing some refactoring. Hugo makes that easy and fast, so it’s okay to delay splitting up a template.
